title: End of season rewards
body: I recently got banned for 14 days (18/09/2017) for int feeding(for 25mins of a 40min game i played normally for the last 15) one ranked flex game due to my team pissing me off in champ select. I know i shouldn't of done that and my punishment is deserved and i have learned from my wrongs but thats not the point. All i'm wondering is will i still receive the victorious skin of this season as im currently sat at  G5 and will i receive a gold boarder? I understand if i'm no longer allowed due to my ban just would like some clearing up to what i shall receive if anything. also just to add this was a one off where i didn't control myself as i had just reached honour lv7

replies.body:
I'm sorry to say I can't bring good news, but you are most likely ineligible to receive any rewards for ranked gameplay this season.

From [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068):

> There are a few ways to miss out on this season’s rewards:
> 
> - Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
> - Players issued a ban of seven days or more from 22/08/2017 are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
> - Players banned for boosting during the 2017 season remain ineligible for rewards.
> - Players who experience fraud-related or erroneous bans will still be eligible.

Just for clarification, I have edited the date in the quote to be in D/M/Y style (Day-month-year), everything else remains unchanged from the Support article.

Considering your ban was issued on 18/09/2017, and was 14 days long, you are ineligible for rewards for this season.
